ItemDesc: Upon use, increases all allies' SPD by <unbreak>16%</unbreak> but reduces their DMG by 8% for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: Resembling a clock, this pizza is precisely divided into twelve equal-sized slices, making it the perfect food for parties.\n\nWhat is the meaning behind the unique shape of this food? Some believe it pays homage to a mysterious wealthy individual, while others see it as a reminder to cherish each passing moment.
